org.terrier.structures

Class BasicTermStatsLexiconEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.structures.LexiconEntry
      • org.terrier.structures.BasicTermStatsLexiconEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, EntryStatistics, Pointer

    public class BasicTermStatsLexiconEntry
extends LexiconEntry
    A LexiconEntry which only contains EntryStatistics
    Author:
    Craig Macdonald
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
